title: Button
description: A button is a user interface element that triggers an action when clicked

label.description: The text or content inside the button

onClick.description: Callback function for when the button is clicked

color.description: Defines the color of the button

size.description: Defines the size of the button

disabled.description: Indicates whether the button is disabled

icon.description: Identifier for an optional icon inside the button

loading.description: Indicates whether the button shows a loading state
